details.description: Find a business registered as a waste carrier in England and Wales who will collect and dispose of your waste
details.introduction: Get details of businesses in England and Wales registered with the Environment Agency to collect your waste.
expectations: Available in England and Wales only

details.description: Includes waste management plans, hazardous waste and preventing pollution
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.

related.title: Waste carrier or broker registration (England and Wales)

details.description: You must register with the Environment Agency before you can transport waste, or buy, sell or broker it - fees, restrictions, fines, penalties

related.title: Waste carrier or broker registration (Northern Ireland)

details.description: You must register with the Northern Ireland Environment Agency before you can transport waste, or buy, sell or broker it - fees, restrictions, fines, penalties
You must register with the Scottish Environment Protection Agency before you can transport waste, or buy, sell or broker it - fees, restrictions, fines, penalties
